alert.note: Alert for Cowlitz (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 06 at 6:48PM PST until January 07 at 2:51PM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Washington... Cowlitz River at Kelso affecting Cowlitz County. Cowlitz River at Castle Rock affecting Cowlitz County. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH FRIDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Cowlitz River at Kelso. * WHEN...Through Friday. * IMPACTS...Above 21.5 feet, flooding of several low lying and secondary roads begins, including the Cowlitz Gardens neighborhood, along with flooding of pasture and lowland upstream of Kelso. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:45 PM PST Thursday the stage was 23.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to crest near moderate flood stage of 24.5 feet tonight. The river should fall back below minor flood stage either Friday night or Saturday. - Minor flood stage is 21.5 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive through flooded areas. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Friday morning at the latest.
